name: Supplier Planning Optimization Tool
description: A data-driven solution to optimize supplier planning for torque tube projects across North America. It automates forecast allocations, reduces landed costs, and supports strategic sourcing decisions.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Supplier Planning Optimization Tool

Overview

This analytical application is designed to optimize procurement planning for solar torque tubes by minimizing overall costs while ensuring that business demands are met across multiple periods. The solution integrates supplier cost structures, demand constraints, transportation logistics, and supplier quality metrics into a unified decision-making framework.

Key features

  • + Demand Forecasting: Distribute total demand across periods within constraints
  • + Supplier Optimization: Evaluate suppliers based on cost, capacity, and defect rates
  • + Logistics Planning: Optimize transportation strategy and shipping costs

Key insights

  • + Cost Optimization: Identify lowest-cost suppliers with minimal defect rates.
  • + Capacity Planning: Match supplier capabilities with product demand distribution.
  • + Demand Efficiency: Optimize order quantities against production constraints.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html3", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

appStages.name: Exploring-Supply-Demand-Data
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [

      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: \u0027Roboto\u0027, sans-serif;margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; margin-bottom: 0; background-color: #fff;\r\n    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px;\r\n    color: #ffffff; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n        \r\n        \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #1E1E1E; font-size: 28px; font-weight: 600; margin-left: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n            Exploring Sales Data\r\n        \u003c/h3\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html4",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"display: flex; margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px; font-family\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: Roboto; margin-top: 10px; margin-left: 35px;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px; margin-left: 3px;\"\u003e\r\n            \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px; margin-bottom: 15px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eGuide to using the App\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e\r\n                     Click \"View Datasets\" to display the dataset info.\r\n\r\n                \u003c/li\u003e\r\n               \r\n            \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n        \r\n    \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html5",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"mt-3\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #023E8A; font-size: 20px;margin-left:20px; font-weight: 400;\"\u003eFeature Columns \u0026 Their Description\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n        \u003cdiv style\u003d\"max-height: 300px; overflow-y: auto; margin-top: -9px; border-bottom-left-radius: 5px; border-bottom-right-radius: 5px; margin-left:20px\"\u003e\r\n            \u003ctable class\u003d\"table table-sm\" style\u003d\"width: 99.5%; border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cthead\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr style\u003d\"background-color: #787575; color: white; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\r\n                        \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\" style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eFIELD NAME\u003c/th\u003e\r\n                        \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\" style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; text-align: left; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eDESCRIPTION\u003c/th\u003e\r\n                    \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n                \u003ctbody class\u003d\"small\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eSuppliers\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eContains information about each supplier, including their name and the minimum number of units they must supply during the planning period. This helps ensure that suppliers are engaged in the allocation.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eSuppliers Product Price\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eLists which products each supplier can provide and the corresponding cost per unit. This data is used to calculate procurement cost and determine valid supplier-product combinations.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eProducts\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eDescribes the physical characteristics of each product, such as its length, weight, and thickness. These attributes are essential for bundling decisions and checking whether the products can be transported within the truck’s space and weight limits.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eProjects\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eIncludes a list of projects, along with the start and end weeks of each one. These weeks define the time window in which deliveries must occur for each project.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eDemand\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eSpecifies how many units of each product are required by each project. This is the core input that defines what needs to be fulfilled through the optimization model.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTrucks\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eProvides details about the truck type being used, specifically its total length and maximum weight capacity. Only one type of truck is assumed, and its dimensions are used to enforce shipping constraints.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eSuppliers Projects\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eShows which suppliers are allowed to deliver to which projects. It also contains the distance to the project, cost per kilometer, and the minimum and maximum percentage of the project’s total demand that each supplier is allowed to fulfill.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                    \u003ctr\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThickness Capacity\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\u003ctd style\u003d\"font-size: 16px; padding: 8px; border: 2px solid #ccc;\"\u003eOutlines the weekly production capacity of each supplier, categorized by the thickness of the products they produce. This ensures that a supplier doesn’t exceed their available capacity in any given week for a specific tube thickness.\u003c/td\u003e\u003c/tr\u003e\r\n                \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n            \u003c/table\u003e\r\n        \u003c/div\u003e\r\n    \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
